CustomField.description: This field when selected and in conjunction with 'Include In Dues' in fee will add charge amounts to bill, thereby increasing bill amounts. Delinquent Amount will be the total amount due including fees billed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field when selected and in conjunction with 'Include In Dues' in fee will add charge amounts to bill, thereby increasing bill amounts. Delinquent Amount will be the total amount due including fees billed.
CustomField.label: Add Fee Amount To Bill
